misscasts.111: The Casting Attempt is considered to be failed (apply Fizzle as normal).

misscasts.222: After resolving the spell effect (including any Attribute Spell), the Caster’s unit suffers 1D6 hits with Armour Penetration 2, Magical Attacks and a Strength equal to the number of Magic Dice that were used for the casting roll.

misscasts.333: After resolving the spell effect (including any Attribute Spell), the Caster’s unit suffers 2D6 hits with Armour Penetration 2, Magical Attacks and a Strength equal to the number of Magic Dice that were used for the casting roll.

misscasts.444: After resolving the spell effect (including any Attribute Spell), the Caster cannot cast the Miscast spell anymore this game.

misscasts.555: After resolving the spell effect (including any Attribute Spell), the Caster suffers 2 hits that wound on 4+ with Armour Penetration 10 and Magical Attacks.

misscasts.666: After resolving the spell effect (including any Attribute Spell), the Caster suffers 4 hits that wound on 4+ with Armour Penetration 10 and Magical Attacks.

misscasts.777: After resolving the spell effect (including any Attribute Spell), the Caster’s model dies. Remove it from the game as a casualty (no saves of any kind allowed).

flux.text: All misscasts this phase gain a +1 Miscast modifier
All misscasts this phase gain a -1 Miscast modifier

spells.name: Alchemical Fire
spells.effect: The target gains Flammable against Melee Attacks.

spells.name: Quicksilver Lash
spells.effect: The target suffers D3+1 hits with Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, and Armour Penetration 10. These hits always wound on a roll equal to or greater than 7 - the target’s Armour. An unmodified ‘6’ always wounds and an unmodified ‘1’ always fails to wound.

spells.name: Word of Iron
spells.effect: The target gains +1/[+2] Armour.

spells.name: Glory of Gold
spells.effect: The target gains +1 Armour Penetration, Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Molten Copper
spells.effect: The target suffers 2D6 [3D6] hits with Strength 3, Armour Penetration 3, Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Corruption of Tin
spells.effect: The target suffers -1 Armour

spells.name: Silver Spike
spells.effect: The target suffers 1 hit with Strength 3 [6], Armour Penetration 10, Magical Attacks, Multiple Wounds (D3), and Penetrating.

paths.effect: : Spells from Divination gain +3″ Range for each other friendly Wizard with non-Bound Spells from Divination within 12″ of the Caster.
paths.name: Divination

spells.name: Guiding Light
spells.effect: Discipline Tests of units with all models affected by the spell are subject to Minimised Roll. A unit cannot be affected by this spell more than once per Magic Phase.

spells.name: Know the Enemy
spells.effect: The target gains +2 Offensive Skill, +2 Defensive Skill, and +2 Agility

spells.name: Fate's Judgement
spells.effect: The target suffers D3 [D6] hits with Magical Attacks that wound automatically, with no Special Saves allowed (note that Armour Saves are allowed).

spells.name: Scrying
spells.effect: The target gains Distracting and Hard Target.

spells.name: The Stars Align
spells.effect: The target gains Divine Attacks, and must reroll failed to-hit rolls with Close Combat and Shooting Attacks.

spells.name: Unerring Strike
spells.effect: The target suffers 2D6[3D6] hits that wound on 4+, with Armour Penetration 1, Divine Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Portent of Doom
spells.effect: For each Character in the target when the spell is cast, the target suffers -1 to Advance Rate, March Rate, Offensive Skill, Defensive Skill, casting rolls, and to-hit rolls with Shooting Attacks.

paths.effect: All Wizards that know at least one Druidism spell (excluding Bound Spells) know the Learned Spell The Oaken Throne in addition to their other spells.
paths.name: Druidism

spells.name: Fountain of Youth
spells.effect: The target or its unit <Recovers> [Raises] 1 Health Point. No single model can Recover (or Raise) more than 1 Health Point per Phase from this spell

spells.name: The Oaken Throne
spells.effect: If the caster has The Oaken Throne in play when certain spells are cast by the caster, the augmented version is used. In that case, use any text marked with { } and ignore any text marked with < >. The Oaken Throne must already be in play when a spell is cast in order to use the amplified Attribute. This spell is ended if the Caster attempts to cast The Oaken Throne again, or if the opponent removes a dice from their Magic Dice pool at the end of step 3 of any Magic Phase sequence (after Siphon the Veil).

spells.name: Healing Waters
spells.effect: The Range of this spell can be measured from the caster or from any Water Terrain Feature on the table. The target gains Regeneration <(5+)>{(4+)}.

spells.name: Master of Earth
spells.effect: The Range of this spell can be measured from the caster, or from any Cliffs Terrain Feature on the table. The target suffers D6 hits with Str <4>{5} and AP <1>{2}.

spells.name: Entwining Roots
spells.effect: The Range of this spell can be measured from the caster or from any Forest Terrain Feature on the table. The target suffers <-1>{-2} Offensive Skill, Defensive Skill and to hit with Shooting Attacks

spells.name: Summer Growth
spells.effect: This spell has different effects depending on the target: Standard Infantry/Beast : Raise <4> {6} Health Points. Towering Presence : Raise<1>{1} Health Point. Anything else : Raise<2>{3} Health Points.

spells.name: Stone Skin
spells.effect: The Range of this spell can be measured from the caster or from any Hill Terrain Feature on the table. The target gains <+2>{+3} Resilience.

spells.name: Spirits of the Wood
spells.effect: Place a Forest underneath the target (this can be substituted by placing a marker or the spell card next to the unit). This Forests always extends to the edges of the unit’s Boundary Rectangle (even if the unit moves or changes formation).{If the target is a friendly unit, it gains Strider (Forest).}

spells.name: Evocation of Souls
spells.effect: If your Veil Token pool contains less than 3 Veil Tokens, you gain one Veil Token. No more than 1 Veil Token can be gained from this spell each Phase

spells.name: Spectral Blades
spells.effect: The target must reroll failed to-wound rolls in Close Combat. [The target gains Lethal Strike]

spells.name: Whispers of the Veil
spells.effect: The target suffers -2 Offensive Skill and -2 Defensive Skill. In addition, a unit with at least one model affected by the spell suffers -1 Discipline.

spells.name: Hasten the Hour
spells.effect: Choose 1 [up to 3] models in the target unit (which may be Characters or Champions). Each of them suffers 1 hit that wounds automatically with Armour Penetration 10 and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Ancestral Aid
spells.effect: The target must reroll failed to-hit rolls with its Close Combat [and Shooting] Attacks

spells.name: Touch of the Reaper
spells.effect: The target suffers D3 hits with Strength 10 and , Armour Penetration 10 and Magical Attacks. When rolling to wound with this attack, use the opponent’s Discipline instead of the opponent’s Resilience.

spells.name: Danse Macabre
spells.effect: The target may perform an 8 [6]  Magical Move and gains Ghost Step during this move.

paths.effect: When casting a non-Bound Spell from this Path, right after the casting roll, but before any Dispel Attempt, the Active Player may choose to inflict X hits on the Caster’s unit or another friendly unengaged unit within 24. Each unit may only be targeted by this ability once per Magic Phase. X is equal to the number of Ranks in the targeted unit, down to a minimum of 2, and up to a maximum of 5. These hits wound automatically and no save of any kind is allowed against them. The last model in a unit can never be removed as a casualty using this ability (any wound that would reduce its Health Point pool to 0 is discarded). Units never take Panic Tests for losing Health Points from The Sacrifice. If at least one wound was caused, the spell is cast with the amplified version. In that case, use any text marked with { } and ignore any text marked with < >.
paths.name: Occultism

spells.name: Pentagram of Pain
spells.effect: The target suffers D6 hits with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 1, and Magical Attacks. [The Caster’s unit is unaffected.] {If one or more unsaved Wounds are caused with this spell, the Caster Recovers 1 Wound.}

spells.name: Hand of Glory
spells.effect: The target {and all models in the same unit} gains Aegis (6+) and Aegis (+1, max 3+).

spells.name: The Rot Within
spells.effect: The target suffers -1 Offensive Skill and -1 Defensive Skill. {The Caster gains +1 Offensive Skill and +1 Defensive Skill.}

spells.name: Breath of Corruption
spells.effect: The target gains Breath Attack (Magical Attacks, Toxic Attacks). {If the Breath Weapon is used as a Shooting Attack, its Range is increased to 18ps.}

spells.name: Marked for Doom
spells.effect: The target suffers 1  hit with Strength 10, Armour Penetration 10, Multiple Wounds (D3), and Magical Attacks. {If the target is within 12″ of the Caster, the spell targets a single Character or Champion joined to the target unit}

spells.name: The Grave Calls
spells.effect: The target suffers 2D6 hits with Strength 5{6}, Armour Penetration 2{3}, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Blaze
spells.effect: The target suffers D3 hits with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 0, Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.effect: The target suffers D6 hits with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 0, Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Cascading Fire
spells.effect: Choose an enemy unit in base contact with the target. This unit suffers D6 [2D6] hits with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 0, Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Flaming Swords
spells.effect: The target’s Melee and Shooting Attacks gain a +1 towound modifier, Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Pyroclastic Flow
spells.effect: The target suffers 2D6/[3D6] hits with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 0, Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Scroching Salvo
spells.effect: The target suffers D3+1 hits with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 0, Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Enveloping Embers
spells.effect: Each model in the target unit suffers 1 hit with Strength 3, Armour Penetration 0, Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Scarification
spells.effect: Melee Attacks against the target cannot wound on better than 5+.

spells.name: Awaken the Beast
spells.effect: The target gains +1 Strength and Armour Penetration [+1 Resilience].

spells.name: Swarm of Insects
spells.effect: Immediately after successfully casting this spell, the target suffers 5D6 hits with Strength 1, Armour Penetration 0, and Magical Attacks. If one or more unsaved wounds are caused, the target suffers -1 to hit with its Shooting Attacks. This spell is immediately ended when the target performs an Advance, March, Charge, or Pursuit Move.

spells.name: Savage Fury
spells.effect: The target gains Frenzy and Battle Focus

spells.name: Chilling Howl
spells.effect: All units within 6 [12] of the target when the spell is cast suffer a -1 to-wound modifier on their Shooting [Ranged] Attacks [including spell effects].

spells.name: Totemic Summon
spells.effect: Summon a Totemic Beast (profile below). It must be placed within 1 [10] of the Board Edge.

spells.name: Break the Spirit
spells.effect: The target suffers a -1 to-hit modifier and treats all Terrain (including Open Terrain) as Dangerous Terrain (2).

paths.effect: When casting non-Bound Spells from this Path, all Magic Dice that result in ‘1’ must be rerolled. Dice causing a Miscast cannot be rerolled. If a Caster Miscasts when casting a spell from this Path, add a +1 Miscast Modifier.
paths.name: Thaumaturgy

spells.name: Hand of Heaven
spells.effect: The target suffers D6 [D6+1] hits with Strength D6 [D6+1], Armour Penetration 2 [3], and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Smite the Unbeliever
spells.effect: Immediately after successfully casting this spell, roll a D6. [Choose which effect to apply when casting the spell.] If 1-3 is rolled, the target suffers -1 Resilience. If 4-6 is rolled, the target suffers -1 Strength and -1 Armour Penetration.

spells.name: Speaking in Tongues
spells.effect: Units with at least one model affected by the spell cannot benefit from Commanding Presence [Rally around the Flag].

spells.name: Cleansing Fire
spells.effect: The target gains Breath Attack (Strength D3+2, Armour Penetration 1, Magical Attacks). (Roll the D3 immediately after successfully casting this spell.)[This spell may only target Characters, Champions, and single model units.]

spells.name: Wrath of God
spells.effect: Choose a point within range on the table and place a counter there. At the end of each subsequent Magic Phase roll a D6; if 1-3 is rolled, add another counter on the same spot. If 4-6 is rolled, each unit within (2D6+X)″, where X is equal to the number of counters, suffers 2D6 hits with Strength 5, Armour Penetration 2, and Magical Attacks. The spell then ends, remove all counters.

spells.name: Trial of Faith
spells.effect: The Caster rolls D3+1 and the target rolls D3. If the Caster’s roll is higher, the target suffers a number of hits equal to the difference between their respective rolls. These hits wound automatically with Armour Penetration 10 and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Evil Eye
spells.effect: If this spell targets a friendly unit, the target gains +1 Advance Rate and +2 March Rate. If this spell targets an enemy unit, the target suffers -1 Advance Rate and -2 March Rate, to a minimum of 3 and 6 respectively. A unit cannot be affected by this spell more than twice in the same Magic Phase.

spells.name: Raven's Wing
spells.effect: The target may perform a 8 [12] Magical Move and gains Fly during this move. Nominate a single model part affected by the spell. This model part may perform a Sweeping Attack during the move (possibly in addition to other Sweeping Attacks). This Sweeping Attack causes D6 hits with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 1, and Magical Attacks.

spells.name: Deceptive Glamour
spells.effect: The target suffers -1 [-2] Offensive Skill, -1 [-2] Defensive Skill, and -1 [-2] Agility.

spells.name: Twisted Effigy
spells.effect: The target cannot use Shooting Attacks [and suffers a -2 modifier to its casting rolls].

spells.name: The Wheel Turns
spells.effect: Close Combat Attacks made by [and allocated against] R&F models in the target unit will successfully roll to hit and to wound on a 4+, regardless of Offensive Skill, Defensive Skill, Strength, and Resilience (apply this before applying any other to-hit and towound modifiers).

spells.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
spells.effect: The target gains Random Movement (2D6 [3D6]).

spells.name: Bewitching Glare
spells.effect: Immediately after successfully casting this spell, the target must choose to either: take a Panic Test at -2 Discipline or be Shaken until the end of its next Player Turn

paths.effect: All Cosmology spells are divided into two versions, representing opposing aspects; Cosmos and Chaos. When casting Cosmology spells, always declare which version of the spell you are using. Whenever the Caster successfully casts a non-Bound Cosmology spell, the next Cosmology spell it attempts to cast has its Casting Value reduced by 1, provided this spell is a Cosmology spell of the opposing aspect.
paths.name: Cosmology

spells.name: spell
spells.effect: effect

spells.name: spell
spells.effect: effect
